short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Data extraction tool for academic purpose

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AcademyScraper is a non-commercial, not for profit chrome extension that helps you scrape websites data from platforms like Linkedin.

This information scraped is strictly to be used for non-commercial or research purposes.

You can use the chrome extension to scrape search results in bulk from Linkedin normal profile or Linkedin Sales Navigator search results in one click.
